import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Calendar, Settings, Users, FileText, Clock, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const HomeScreen = ({ onNavigate }) => { const [quickMode, setQuickMode] = useState(false); const handleNavigation = (screen) => { onNavigate(screen, { quickMode }); }; return (
